paper_abstract: In this paper, we point out that the 'only if' part of Lemma 1 in a previous paper by Pap [The range of null-additive fuzzy and non-fuzzy measures Fuzzy Sets and Systems 65 (1994) 105-115] is incorrect. We give a correct necessary and sufficient condition and its proof. (C) 2009 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Yet another note on the range of null-additive fuzzy and non-fuzzy measures
